name: normal
arg_type: uint64_t seed, T mean, T stddev,
op: do { curandState_t state; curand_init(seed, xid, 0, &state); input[xid] = (T)curand_normal(&state) * stddev + mean; } while (0)

name: uniform
arg_type: uint64_t seed, T a, T b,
op: do { curandState_t state; curand_init(seed, xid, 0, &state); input[xid] = (T)curand_uniform(&state) * (b - a) + a; } while (0)
